allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(geminicall\): Add MCP tool calling support and enhance Ollama compatibility

- Add MCP server registry with mcp.json persistence \(auto-save/load\)
- Add ReAct agent loop for prompt-based tool calling \(Gemma 3 support\)
- Add /mcp/add, /mcp/remove, /mcp/list endpoints for MCP server management
- Add /generate_with_mcp endpoint with JSON-RPC 2.0 format
- Add Ollama /api/show, /api/ps endpoints and model details
- Handle system_instruction for models that don''t support it \(Gemma\)
- Add verbose debug logging for MCP agent loop
- Add CLI chat client \(test_mcp_chat.py\) and toolcalling test script
- Add unit tests \(23\) and integration tests \(8\) for MCP features

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
